DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety, tolerability, and immunogenicity of ACC-001, an investigational vaccine, in subjects with mild to moderate Alzheimer's disease in Japan.
DOC.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability, And Immunogenicity Study Of ACC-001 In Japanese Subjects With Mild To Moderate Alzheimer's Disease
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of mild to moderate Alzheimer's Disease MiniMental State Examination (MMSE) 1626 Significant Neurological Disease other than Alzheimer's disease Major psychiatric disorder Clinically significant systemic illness
